        public java.lang.String hashPasswordToMessage(java.lang.String password)
        Hashes a String to an encryption message consisting of the salt length, the salt and the hashed string.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the encryption message.

      • checkPasswordHash

        public boolean checkPasswordHash(java.lang.String password,
                                 java.lang.String encodedMessage)
        Hashes the input string and checks if it is equal to a given hash.
        Parameters:
        password - the string to be hashed.
        encodedMessage - the encryption message that it will be compared to.
        Returns:
        true if it is equal, false if not.

      • hashPassword

        public byte[] hashPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Hashes a password with random salt.
        Parameters:
        password - the password.
        Returns:
        the hash as a byte array.

      • encodeBytesBase64

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • decodeStringBase64

        public byte[] decodeStringBase64(java.lang.String toDecode)
        Decodes a Base64 encoded String.
        Parameters:
        toDecode - the string to decode.
        Returns:
        the decoded string.

      • encryptToMessage

        public byte[] encryptToMessage(java.lang.String toEncrypt,
                               java.lang.String masterpassword)
        Encrypts a string to an encryption message consisting of the length of the iv, the iv and the encrypted string.
        Parameters:
        toEncrypt - the string to encrypt.
        masterpassword - the password used for encryption.
        Returns:
        the encryption message as byte array.

      • decryptMessage

        public java.lang.String decryptMessage(byte[] message,
                                       java.lang.String masterpassword)
        Decrypts an encryption message.
        Parameters:
        message - the encryption message
        masterpassword - the password used for decryption.
        Returns:
        the decrypted String.
